p3System

Class ArrayGarbageCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • p3System.ArrayGarbageCollector

  • public class ArrayGarbageCollector
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an array garbage collector object. It holds the necessary information to efficiently and effectively destroy inactive arrays on a given system.
    Author:
    samus250

      Crates an ArrayGarbageCollector object.

    • Method Detail

      • getRegisteredArrays

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getRegisteredArrays()
        Returns an ArrayList of the currently registered arrays.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the addresses of currently registered arrays.

      • gc

        public void gc(P1MemSystem p1Sys)
        Performs garbage collection on the given memory system.
        Parameters:
        p1Sys - the memory system where to perform garbage collection.

      • registerArray

        public void registerArray(int address)
        Register an array.
        Parameters:
        address - the address where the new array has been registered.

      • removeRegisteredArray

        public void removeRegisteredArray(int address)
        Removes a registered array.
        Parameters:
        address - the address of where the array to be removed is.

      • sendArrayToGC

        public void sendArrayToGC(int address,
                          int lastAddress)
        Send a given array to garbage collection.
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the array to send to garbage collection.
        lastAddress - the address of the last byte of the array to send to garbage collection.
